casebody.data:
No. 09-944. Placer Dome, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Provincial Government of Marinduque, Republic of the Philippines. 559 U.S. 1065, 130 S. Ct. 2139,

176 L. Ed. 2d 719,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3473. April 19, 2010.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Same case below, 582 F.3d 1083.
